english.segment1: I will dance. I will sing. To be mad. For my King. Nothing Lord. Is hindering. This passion in my soul
english.segment2: Chorus: And I'll become. Even more undignified than this. Some may say. It's foolishness. But I'll become. Even more undignified than this. Leave my pride. By my side. And I'll become. Even more undignified than this. Some may say. It's foolishness. But I'll become. Even more undignified than this. Than this
english.segment3: La, la, la, la, la, HEY!. La, la, la, la, la. La, la, la, la, la, HEY!. La, la, la, la, la
english.segment4: It's all for You my Lord!
